statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryData;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM InventoryData WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM InventoryData ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, supplier_id FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level < 20 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryData WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_id, last_updated FROM InventoryData WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM stock_levels GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain WHERE unit_price > 100.00;
SELECT product_id, location, timestamp FROM stock_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM supply_chain WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, location, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE location = 'Store' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, product_name, unit_price FROM supply_chain WHERE unit_price < 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels;
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supply_id, supplier_id, delivery_date FROM SupplyChain WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, stock_level, last_update FROM StockLevels ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, delivery_date FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplyChain ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplyChain.supplier_id ORDER BY delivery_date;
SELECT product_id, supplier_id FROM SupplyChain WHERE delivery_date <= '2023-01-01' AND supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York');
SELECT product_id, MAX(stock_level) AS max_stock_level FROM StockLevels GROUP BY product_id HAVING max_stock_level > 50 ORDER BY max_stock_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplyChain ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplyChain.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT id, location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped'
